title: Lincoln Home National Historic Site: Education
body: Education         United States Colored Troops Youth Education Program at Lincoln Home NHS, Summer 2013 NPS Photo  The Lincoln Home has been the destination for generations of teachers and students. Today, Lincoln Home National Historic Site continues to provide resources to teachers, from the ever popular field trips, to on line lesson plans, to teacher workshops, we take advantage of every opportunity to assist educators in presenting information on the life and legacy of Abraham Lincoln to today's learners.       Lincoln Home NHS Park Ranger with school group in the Lincoln back yard, early 1990s. NPS Photo        Students waiting to enter the Lincoln home, 1974. NPS Photo        Students and adults in front of the Lincoln home, 1877. NPS Photo
